price: 6. Waxayna (ku) yidhaahdeen (Nabiga): Kan Waanada (Qur’aanka) lagu soo dejiyeyow3! Adigu waxaad tahay jinnoole.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِي نُزِّلَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلذِّكۡرُ إِنَّكَ لَمَجۡنُونٞ
footnotes: 3. Waxay sidaas gaaladu ugu yidhaahdeen Nabi Muxammad s,c,w, ku digasho iyo jeesjees ahaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqālū yāayyuhā alladhī nuzzila ʿalayhi al-dhik'ru innaka lamajnūnun
